data.text:
2023-24 Men's Golf Roster

Choose a Player:

Brady Carlson

Blake Brantley

Class Junior

Hometown Winston-Salem, N.C.

Highschool R.J. Reynolds High School

Bio

Related

Historical

Moments

Biography

2022-23:

Competed in eight events

Helped team place fourth in the Ivy League Championship

Finished in a tie for seventh place in the Georgetown Intercollegiate

Scholar All-American

2021-22:

Competed in eight events

Posted 73.10 average

Finished third at Yale Invitational, fourth at Macdonald Cup

Tied for sixth at Ivy League Championships

Low round was 67 at UC San Diego Tournament

Shot a 71 in the NCAA Regional at Yale.

Before Yale:

Selected for 2019 Carolinas Golf Association All-State Team

Finished third at 2019 NCHSAA 4A State Championship and Regionals

Finished fifth at Carolinas Junior Boys Championship

Finished 11th at the 95th BB&T Carolinas Open

Finished 13th at Optimist International Championship

Finished 14th at 72nd Donald Ross Junior Championship

Finished third at 2018 Pinehurst High School Invitational

Lowest competitive round was 64 (twice)

All-state recipient, two-time all-conference

Two-time all-region, three-time high school captain, three-time team MVP

Conference player of the year

Three-year varsity letter recipient.

Off the Course: Co-Founder of “Golf Fore Life,” a non-profit to raise funds and equipment for the First Tee of the Triad… As of 2020, the organization raised $20,000 and donated hundreds of pieces of golf equipment to the First Tee… Served as Vice President of R.J. Reynolds High School’s Key Club… Volunteer coach at the First Tee of the Triad chapter and volunteer for many other charities in the community… Recipient of R.J. Reynolds High School Brevard Hoover Award for character and leadership in athletics… Bojangles Scholar-Athlete of the Week award winner… Served as captain on the Summit School basketball team freshman year.

Personal: Is the only child of Tabatha and Chris… Mother was a collegiate tennis player and dad is an avid golfer.
